item.title: Contact Me
item.description: The best place to contact me is probably over email, but you can also shoot me a message over at LinkedIn, or browse my back catalogue of out-of-context tweets if you like. Email me: hello@tylerquinlivan.com LinkedIn: tylerquinlivan Twitter: tyleraquinlivan

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! My name’s Tyler, and I work in infosec in the Melbourne region. Specifically, my current work focus and experience is on: Detection - creating well-optimised SIEM rules to feed a bespoke risk-aggregation pipeline, and Orchestration - using SOAR to automate away as much of the boring stuff as we can, and Phishing - building an alerting and response framework to detect and, more importantly, take down phishing sites as soon as possible.
